title: Seer Among Us
description: A young girl from the inner-city of Chicago possesses a phenomenal ability. She helps and cures those in need by implementing her global vision for the world. Natalie Walsh grows into an amazing woman with extraordinary powers, risking her life to save others from impending peril. Derek Van Burenâ€™s troublesome childhood on the opposite side of the lake guides him toward power, money, and revenge. Global events unleash a sinister power possessed by this evil genius. His chance encounter with the mysterious Natalie Walsh leads him on a path to possess her mind, body, and soul with the future of the world spiraling toward anarchy.
author: Alister Burns
